attributes.action: Please ask the people first before you..................
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Prime Minister, this one and the others that may follow.
We would like you, to ask us, your voting people that put you in Parliament, if it's OK to change "things" before you rush off and do it without our say so, and in our name.
This means anything!
It is "our" World not Westminsters.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
Statements that don't actually request any action
